markdownRemark.html: Gobang Cikeruh adalah sejenis senjata tajam yang berasal dari Cikeruh Sumedang. dikenal dengan Gobang Cikeruhan atau golok Cikeruhan. Memiliki bentuk yang khas, unik ada ukiran di dalam badan Gobang Cikeruh ini berupa hiasan untaian berbentu daun, daun dan kembang melati. Terdapat juga hiasan berhuruf Arab lengkap dan gundul. atau Pemegang keris yang dihiasi dengan aksen ukiran berbentuk daun serasi dengan hiasan badan keris, berbentuk bulat dilapisi warna kuning emas. Terdapat pula hiasan horizontal antara batang gobang dan gagangnya dengan tiap ujungnya lancip tumpul. Gobang Cikeruhan ini dibuat tahun 1901, sebagai bukti perkembangan kebudayan dan kerajinan logam di Sumedang. Gobang Cikeruhan sekarang menjadi kekayaan khasanah Benda koleksi Keraton Sumedang Larang.

frontmatter.title: Gobang Cikeruh
frontmatter.textEnglish: Gamelan Sanglir is a collection of relics from Prince Aria Suria Kusumah Adinata (Prince Sugih). This gamelan is approximately 135 years old. Gamelan Sanglir is still used and functioning well. At the time of Prince Sugih Gamelan Sanglir was used as an accompaniment to old/buhun songs. This gamelan is stored in the Gamelan Building of the Sumedang Larang Palace.

frontmatter.title: Gobang Atau Golok Panjang
frontmatter.textEnglish: Gobang is a long sword weapon. Gobang is a sharp weapon that has its own power for its owners. This heirloom is no less majestic like a samurai….pay attention to its shape!…. Collections of various kinds of gobang are stored in the Heritage Building and the Gendeng Building of the Sumedang Larang Palace. There are several sizes of Gobang which are inherited from Sumedang's ancestors.. Come on, pay attention.....a series of Gobangs are here.........

frontmatter.title: Jubah (Pangeran Sugih)
frontmatter.textEnglish: Look at this robe! This robe is a relic of Prince Aria Kusumah Adinata (Prince Sugih). This robe is a maroon-colored Sumedang heritage that was once worn by Prince Aria Kusumah Adinata (Prince Sugih). Named the robe because this garment is long that covers the neck to the ankles.
